Deception {2}{W}{W} [i]({2}{W}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flying, lifelink
When this creature enters, if it's attacking, exile up to one target creature.
notes: A shimmer on the water, a stray reflection or something else entirely?
